items.content_html: A lightweight reactive data library for javascript applications. Designed over composable primitives.
items.title: emberjs/data: A lightweight reactive data library for javascript applications. Designed over composable primitives.

items.content_html: This is a simple and lightweight web-based video calling application built using modern web technologies. It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.
items.title: devesh-y/Video-Calling-Application: This is a simple and lightweight web-based video calling application built using modern web technologies. It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.

items.content_html: Container-images is a lightweight library (0.6KB gzipped) which allows you to use container queries for images.
items.title: felixranesberger/container-images: Container-images is a lightweight library (0.6KB gzipped) which allows you to use container queries for images.

items.content_html: A lightweight CQRS module for Nest framework (node.js) 🎈
items.title: nestjs/cqrs: A lightweight CQRS module for Nest framework (node.js) :balloon:

items.content_html: Lightweight Gulp template for website building.
items.title: eugenemashegirov/gulp-start-template: Lightweight Gulp template for website building.

items.content_html: Microfields is a lightweight TypeScript microservice library designed to simplify the development of microservices. It provides essential tools and utilities for building scalable and maintainable microservices, allowing you to focus on your business logic.
items.title: fitchle/microfields: Microfields is a lightweight TypeScript microservice library designed to simplify the development of microservices. It provides essential tools and utilities for building scalable and maintainable microservices, allowing you to focus on your business logic.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.title: githru/githru-vscode-ext: Lightweight but robust Githru for VSCode Extension

items.content_html: A tool to create a lightweight React sandbox on your local system that runs like Create React App but without all the dependencies.
items.title: bruce-x-wu/create-react-sandbox: A tool to create a lightweight React sandbox on your local system that runs like Create React App but without all the dependencies.

items.content_html: An un-opinionated and lightweight scaffolding styling provider for your React web applications.

items.content_html: Lightweight driven query language
items.title: syarul/requrse: Lightweight driven query language

items.content_html: Task-Tracker is a simple yet powerful todo application built using React.js, designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. This lightweight web app stores tasks in the browser's localStorage, making it convenient and accessible across sessions.
items.title: nitesh-1810/Task-Tracker: Task-Tracker is a simple yet powerful todo application built using React.js, designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. This lightweight web app stores tasks in the browser's localStorage, making it convenient and accessible across sessions.

items.content_html: Project dedicated to fight Layer 7 DDoS with proof of work, with an additional WAF and controller. Completed with full set of features and containerized for rapid and lightweight deployment.
items.title: RuiSiang/PoW-Shield: Project dedicated to fight Layer 7 DDoS with proof of work, with an additional WAF and controller. Completed with full set of features and containerized for rapid and lightweight deployment.
